Title: Monsieur Verdoux
Writer: Charles Chaplin (an original story written by), Orson Welles (based on an idea by)
Actors: Charles Chaplin, Mady Correll, Allison Roddan, Robert Lewis
Plot: Monsieur Verdoux is a bluebeard, he marries women and kills them after the marriage to get the money he needs for his family. But with two ladies he has bad luck.
